messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: [nihonto] Re: For Tsuba Lovers
messages.msgSnippet: Lou, With  famous mei  like that, if you want to have it shinsa, better send it directly to Japan ( after having it looked over by Jim and/or Cary first ).
messages.messageBody:
Lou,
With " famous mei " like that, if you want to have it shinsa, better send it
directly to Japan ( after having it looked over by Jim and/or Cary first ).
Oversea shinsa, being " so rushed ", the shinsa team will be hesitant to pass
a big name ( not that they won't ). Just my personal opinion, of course.

Milt


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [nihonto] Re: For Tsuba Lovers
messages.msgSnippet: A picture of the back and the mei have been added.  The front and back pictures can be enlarged to fill the screen.  The mei is as large as I can get it with
messages.messageBody:
A picture of the back and the mei have been added. The front and back
pictures can be enlarged to fill the screen. The mei is as large as I can get it
with my limited knowledge of my new scanner. The pictures are in the folder
Lou's stuff. Comments welcome.

Lou
